How many people are affected by hereditary folate malabsorption ?,"The prevalence of hereditary folate malabsorption is unknown. Approximately 15 affected families have been reported worldwide. Researchers believe that some infants with this disorder may not get diagnosed or treated, particularly in areas where advanced medical care is not available.",GHR,hereditary folate malabsorption
